column4: Hi I just tested the Live version of ubunto on my laptop and it seems to work really good except that glxinfo says I don't have Direct rendering, Is there a way to check if it is possible to get GL working on my laptop before i install it (i have to format my disk that has important data on it and i don't want to do that if i have to install windows again later), I have a ATI Radeon 9700 Mobility card
i have ati radeon mobility 9600 so it should work
